questions.question: Considering the overall visual layout, what is the predominant textual feature displayed prominently across the image?

Observing the numerical data, what is the total caloric value stated per serving?
Based on the presented figures, what is the amount of protein, in grams, per serving?
Examining the nutritional information, what is the quantity of dietary fiber in grams?
From the nutritional facts, what is the amount of sodium, in milligrams, per serving?
Looking at the text, what is the serving size, approximately in cups?
According to the visible text, how many servings are approximately contained within the package?
What is the primary color used for the background of the nutrition label?
Based on the text, what is the total amount of carbohydrate, in grams, per serving?
Observing the text, what is the number of milligrams of potassium per serving?
